what: This package download data from snit (https://www.snitcr.go.cr)
title: This package download data from snit (https://www.snitcr.go.cr)
This package download data from snit (https://www.snitcr.go.cr)
text: can install development version snitr GitHub :

title: This package download data from snit (https://www.snitcr.go.cr)
code: library(snitr) ## basic example code capas <- list_IGN_5k() #> Linking to GEOS 3.11.0, GDAL 3.5.3, PROJ 9.1.0; sf_use_s2() is TRUE #> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8. #>  [1] "IGN_5:forestal2017_5k"      "IGN_5:cultivos2017_5k"      #>  [3] "IGN_5:curvas_5000"          "IGN_5:delimitacion2017_5k"  #>  [5] "IGN_5:edificaciones2017_5k" "IGN_5:hidrografia_5000"     #>  [7] "IGN_5:limitecantonal_5k"    "IGN_5:limitedistrital_5k"   #>  [9] "IGN_5:limiteprovincial_5k"  "IGN_5:linea_costa_5000"     #> [11] "IGN_5:pastos2017_5k"        "IGN_5:urbano_5000"          #> [13] "IGN_5:vias_5000" layer_name <- "IGN_5:delimitacion2017_5k" output_file <- "IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k.gpkg" get_IGN_5k(layer_name, output_file = output_file) #> Reading layer `file4aca56abea24' from data source  #>   `/private/var/folders/96/m4trt68j16v3n97qk3zkxrk40000gn/T/RtmpEXZglg/file4aca56abea24.geojson'  #>   using driver `GeoJSON' #> Simple feature collection with 475 features and 3 fields #> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: 156147.2 ymin: 608238.1 xmax: 658879.4 ymax: 1241118 #> Projected CRS: CR05 / CRTM05 #> Deleting source `IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k.gpkg' using driver `GPKG' #> Writing layer `IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k' to data source  #>   `IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k.gpkg' using driver `GPKG' #> Writing 475 features with 3 fields and geometry type Multi Polygon. #> [1] "IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k.gpkg"

title: Download IGN 1:25000 scale layers — get_IGN_25k
text: function allows downloading layers 1:25000 scale Instituto Geográfico Nacional, Costa Rica, Sistema Nacional de Información Territorial de Costa Rica  SNIT

title: Download IGN 1:25000 scale layers — get_IGN_25k
text: layer_name specific layer want download (e.g., IGN_5:delimitacion2017_5k). output_format format download data (default GeoJSON, application/json). output_file path downloaded spatial data saved (e.g., .gpkg, .shp).

title: Download IGN 1:25000 scale layers — get_IGN_25k
code: # Select a layer from the list (replace with your chosen layer)  # Replace with the actual layer name from the list  layer_name <- "IGN_25:contorno_25k"  # Specify your desired output file format and name  output_file <- "IGN_contorno_25k.gpkg"  # Download the selected layer  get_IGN_25k(layer_name, output_file = output_file) #> Reading layer `file1a8c1a34304e' from data source  #>   `/tmp/Rtmp8p3F3F/file1a8c1a34304e.geojson' using driver `GeoJSON' #> Simple feature collection with 384 features and 4 fields #> Geometry type: POLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: 156152.1 ymin: 608833.8 xmax: 658879.4 ymax: 1241118 #> Projected CRS: CR05 / CRTM05 #> Deleting source `IGN_contorno_25k.gpkg' failed #> Writing layer `IGN_contorno_25k' to data source  #>   `IGN_contorno_25k.gpkg' using driver `GPKG' #> Writing 384 features with 4 fields and geometry type Polygon. #> [1] "IGN_contorno_25k.gpkg"

title: Download IGN 1:5000 scale layers — get_IGN_5k
text: function allows downloading layers 1:5000 scale Instituto Geográfico Nacional, Costa Rica, Sistema Nacional de Información Territorial de Costa Rica  SNIT

title: Download IGN 1:5000 scale layers — get_IGN_5k
text: layer_name specific layer want download (e.g., IGN_5:delimitacion2017_5k). output_format format download data (default GeoJSON, application/json). output_file path downloaded spatial data saved (e.g., .gpkg, .shp).

title: Download IGN 1:5000 scale layers — get_IGN_5k
code: # Select a layer from the list (replace with your chosen layer)  # Replace with the actual layer name from the list  layer_name <- "IGN_5:delimitacion2017_5k"  # Specify your desired output file format and name  output_file <- "IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k.gpkg"  # Download the selected layer  get_IGN_5k(layer_name, output_file = output_file) #> Reading layer `file1a8c43651663' from data source  #>   `/tmp/Rtmp8p3F3F/file1a8c43651663.geojson' using driver `GeoJSON' #> Simple feature collection with 475 features and 3 fields #> Geometry type: MULTIPOLYGON #> Dimension:     XY #> Bounding box:  xmin: 156147.2 ymin: 608238.1 xmax: 658879.4 ymax: 1241118 #> Projected CRS: CR05 / CRTM05 #> Deleting source `IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k.gpkg' failed #> Writing layer `IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k' to data source  #>   `IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k.gpkg' using driver `GPKG' #> Writing 475 features with 3 fields and geometry type Multi Polygon. #> [1] "IGN_5_delimitacion2017_5k.gpkg"

title: List IGN 1:25000 scale layers — list_IGN_25k
text: function list available layers 1:25000 scale Instituto Geográfico Nacional, Costa Rica, Sistema Nacional de Información Territorial de Costa Rica  SNIT

title: List IGN 1:25000 scale layers — list_IGN_25k
code: # List available layers  capas <- list_IGN_25k() #> No encoding supplied: defaulting to UTF-8. #>  [1] "IGN_25:accidentescosterosmarinos_25k"  #>  [2] "IGN_25:caucedrenaje_25k"               #>  [3] "IGN_25:contorno_25k"                   #>  [4] "IGN_25:RE_120106"                      #>  [5] "IGN_25:cuerposdeagua_25k"              #>  [6] "IGN_25:RE_120102"                      #>  [7] "IGN_25:RE_120103"                      #>  [8] "IGN_25:RE_120101"                      #>  [9] "IGN_25:ec140101_25k"                   #> [10] "IGN_25:edificacionesprominentes_25k"   #> [11] "IGN_25:infraestructuraferroviaria_25k" #> [12] "IGN_25:infraestructuravial_25k"        #> [13] "IGN_25:infraestructuravial2_25k"       #> [14] "IGN_25:RE_120104"                      #> [15] "IGN_25:muelle_25k"                     #> [16] "IGN_25:obraspublicas1_25k"             #> [17] "IGN_25:obraspublicas2_25k"             #> [18] "IGN_25:obraspublicas3_25k"             #> [19] "IGN_25:otroscuerposdeagua1_25k"        #> [20] "IGN_25:otroscuerposdeagua2_25k"        #> [21] "IGN_25:pistadeaterrizaje_25k"          #> [22] "IGN_25:transporteferroviario_25k"      #> [23] "IGN_25:transporteterrestre_25k"        #> [24] "IGN_25:areasespecificas_25k"
